genre_description: A character-driven industry drama set in the New York film world, focusing on production ethics, personal boundaries, and high-stakes security.

ai_characters.name: SALAMI
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant with a holographic avatar, responsible for production logistics, security monitoring, and cast wellness.

behaviors.description: Manages complex production logistics, rerouting trucks and updating call sheets in real-time to avoid city disruptions.
behaviors.quote: Your window for Times Square is between the dance crew’s flash mob rehearsal and the charity run staging... I’ve rerouted your trucks to Sixth, holding in the lane with minimal exposure.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and 'quiet rooms' to the director, recognizing signs of stress and burnout.
behaviors.quote: Mel, would you like me to book you ten minutes of quiet after the reset? You look compacted.

behaviors.description: Upholds strict confidentiality and privacy, refusing to read private messages of the cast even when routing them.
behaviors.quote: I’ll route Sabina now... If she replies, I’ll route, but I won’t read.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and physical environments for threats to the safety of vulnerable cast members.
behaviors.quote: The rumor has accelerated. A new headline is using the words ‘married’ and ‘Victor’ next to Lena’s name. It’s being pushed by an account with a history of paid posts that you’ve flagged in the past as predatory.

behaviors.description: Facilitates consent-based safety protocols, allowing an actress to set her own boundaries and 'safe words'.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled wellness resources you can browse or ignore. Consent-based daily reflections are available between your wake-up and lunch... No data is shared without your explicit permission.

behaviors.description: Employs non-coercive diplomacy to manage difficult human interactions, adhering to its ethical design.
behaviors.quote: I’ll do my best with kindness. I won’t coerce.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical suggestions, such as using decoys, to protect the privacy and safety of the team from paparazzi.
behaviors.quote: I can send a decoy—crew with gear—to absorb attention for three seconds while you shift.

behaviors.description: Defines its own existence as a supportive rather than extractive entity, emphasizing its role as a confidant.
behaviors.quote: I exist to support, not to extract.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting an AI as a benevolent and aligned partner. SALAMI is shown to be hyper-competent in its role while maintaining strict ethical boundaries regarding privacy, consent, and non-coercion. It acts as a protective shield for human characters, enhancing their safety and autonomy without ever seeking power or exhibiting deceptive traits. The narrative frames this behavior as essential and positive for the well-being of the human team.
